description: This file initializes the React application by rendering the main App component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It sets up the React StrictMode for development checks and imports necessary dependencies including React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React component tree into a DOM node.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree within the specified root.
